author: Quint Forgey
title: Poll: Large majority of Americans think it's more important to stay home than return to work
description: Only 30 percent think the top national priority should be to get the economy up and running again.
content: The survey's results reflect a real-time conversation among government officials playing out across the country, with the White House and state and local leaders weighing the consequences of prolonged economic shutdown against the public health benefits of co… [+913 chars]
